name: SLICE DOWN
description:
In slice down your some guy with a sword and the ability to slow down time. (so sword slice and slow down so slice down. get it?)

Go through and slice through the competition and make your way to THE TOWER.

(Disclaimer: This is my first 3D game so be aware there might be bugs and what not. I tried to iron down it as much as I could but let me know if you come across anything)
